channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sony Bravia Theater Quad Review: Crazy Immersion, Crazy Expensive
item.description: Sony’s discreet new surround sound system offers incredible immersion for an incredible fee.

item.title: What’s in the rug? How TikTok got swept into a real-time true crime story

item.title: Stealthy Malware Has Infected Thousands of Linux Systems for Years
item.description: Perfctl malware is hard to detect, persists after reboots, and can perform a breadth of malicious activities.

item.title: 5 ‘dumbphones’ that can still run WhatsApp
item.description: With the luddite revival in full-swing, here are five dumbphones that can still run WhatsApp — and a few others. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserve...

item.title: The Best iPhone 16 Cases, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: I’ve tested more than 70 cases for Apple’s iPhone 16 range. These are the best cases, along with a few MagSafe accessories.

item.title: The Best Tested Apple 3-in-1 Wireless Chargers (2024)

item.title: These 5 Automatic Cat Feeders Were the Best We Tested
item.description: We tested some of the most popular automatic dry and wet food pet feeders to see which ones are worth the money.
